channel.title: Corrupted Minecraft's (CMC's) Mini Client Made By SnowBoardin360
channel.description:
[b]Features:[/b] Instant w/ settable speed (min 0.1) Xray Fullbright Tunnel Custom flyhack (due to new bukkit plugin disabling zombe) Close player (radar: max 75) Areabreaker (nuker) (no server/client lag whatsoever): no settable blocks, distance: 3, Speed set to 1 second No fall damage TorchHack Namehack Bigname Mobname 1x1 towers (max height - 6) Seeing players whilst there sneaking Sneak hack (turns orange when people somewhat near, turns red when people really near, toggleable and can fly with it on) unique GUI ;)
Every hack you see above is fully working (though some are nerfed due to it purely being a MINI client) =D This is a miniture version of my full client which features about 3-4x more hacks. I most likely won't be updating this on 1.8 (though I will my full client) so have fun with it while you can! I may even add more hacks to it later on :D
Rename the jar to minecraft and run minecraft normally and you're in. http://dl.dropbox.com/u/36169430/Corrupt...Client.jar
Kthxbye

item.title: Corrupted Minecraft's (CMC's) Mini Client Made By SnowBoardin360
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

@Rayyfersherrx3
Thanks dude

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:9, topic:408870”][quote author=xxx123xxx link=topic=510149.msg3716888#msg3716888 date=1313700071]
I really don’t see what he did wrong, They are mods and this is a website based on cheating/botting/P servers.
[/quote]

no not this site but moparscape is based on cheating moparcraft is for legit minecraft servers[/quote]

Nothing is legit, as the guy said you allow cracked clients thus supporting it. And the part I don’t understand is why do you care if somebody is cheating on any Minecraft server.
There is no economy to be ruined.
Some people like classic mode and enjoy building. They also might like PvP.
The problem is not the hacks but the people who use them. If they want to be a dick and grief let them do so and banned. But let the people who are by themselves do whatever the hell they want as long as they are not disturbing anybody. And too actually say that this is not a cheating website is slightly incorrect. This is just another section of the main forum, MITB just split it. Just look at the bottom, why need a copyright for Runescape on a Minecraft forum. And LOOK WHERE YOU Posted this is the “MineCraft General” BOARD! Hence anything related to Minecraft in any way.
Definition: General - Considering or including the main features or elements of something, and disregarding exceptions; overall

All these accusations without any sort of proof is an outrage… So don’t post next time unless it says somewhere in the MineCraft General board about “unfair client modification are strictly prohibited”.

And no offense to Mironic since I actually like the guy but don’t say things like that without any factual proof.
Go ahead and flame/troll.

Read full topic
item.source: Corrupted Minecraft's (CMC's) Mini Client Made By SnowBoardin360

item.title: Corrupted Minecraft's (CMC's) Mini Client Made By SnowBoardin360
item.dc:creator: @Rayyfersherrx3 Rayyfersherrx3
item.description:
@Rayyfersherrx3 wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:9, topic:408870”][quote author=xxx123xxx link=topic=510149.msg3716888#msg3716888 date=1313700071]
I really don’t see what he did wrong, They are mods and this is a website based on cheating/botting/P servers.
[/quote]

no not this site but moparscape is based on cheating moparcraft is for legit minecraft servers[/quote]

if that were so, then the servers wouldnt be using bukkit and they wouldnt allow players to connect from cracked clients.

[quote=“badger41, post:10, topic:408870”][quote author=xxx123xxx link=topic=510149.msg3716888#msg3716888 date=1313700071]
I really don’t see what he did wrong, They are mods and this is a website based on cheating/botting/P servers.
[/quote]

herp derp keep in mind like 99% of the mods in this client will get you banned if youre found using them on the server.

@OP: i strongly suggest you remove this and work on something not oriented to pathetic cheating methods[/quote]

not once did he say “go and use this on moparcraft!”, so what players do with it is not his concern. i actually enjoy flying and using x-ray in single player mode, and although i wouldn’t download this because i have most of the mods listed, i say its good enough to be released.

Read full topic

item.title: Corrupted Minecraft's (CMC's) Mini Client Made By SnowBoardin360
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

Features:
Instant w/ settable speed (min 0.1)
Xray
Fullbright
Tunnel
Custom flyhack (due to new bukkit plugin disabling zombe)
Close player (radar: max 75)
Areabreaker (nuker) (no server/client lag whatsoever): no settable blocks, distance: 3, Speed set to 1 second
No fall damage
TorchHack
Namehack
Bigname
Mobname
1x1 towers (max height - 6)
Seeing players whilst there sneaking
Sneak hack (turns orange when people somewhat near, turns red when people really near, toggleable and can fly with it on)
unique GUI

Every hack you see above is fully working (though some are nerfed due to it purely being a MINI client) =D
This is a miniture version of my full client which features about 3-4x more hacks.
I most likely won’t be updating this on 1.8 (though I will my full client) so have fun with it while you can! I may even add more hacks to it later on

Rename the jar to minecraft and run minecraft normally and you’re in.
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/36169430/Corrupt...Client.jar

Kthxbye
